document.full_text: japan's panasonic corp will have an extremely tough year, with the effects of the devastating march earthquake continuing to hamper sales through september, the head of the electronics giant said on friday.
document.title: panasonic sees tough year as quake aftermath hampers
lines_and_colors: japan's panasonic corp will have an extremely tough year, with the effects of the devastating march earthquake continuing to hamper sales through september, the head of the electronics giant said on friday.
